name: Mika Feature Scout
intro_lines: The producer goes to Mika to consult him about a plan to make a personalized outfit for him. Mika wants to make the outfit himself and gets time to do so, but in the middle of making it, he gets stuck...

name: Meowsketeers
intro_lines: Ritsu was napping on ES property. When a bad dream woke him up, a cat was on top of him. After that, the cat wouldn’t go away from him, seeming to have taken a liking to him...

name: Tatsumi Feature Scout
intro_lines: Tatsumi is asked by the producer about a personalized outfit for himself, but, hesitating on the design, he asks for and receives a day to think about it. He runs into Aira, who is taking a break, and...

name: √ AtoZ
intro_lines: Chiaki and company are to form a shuffle unit. Gathering together members who seem like they can think up a date plan is tough. And Kaoru doesn’t seem to be his normal self either...

name: Ibara Feature Scout
story_name: The Attacks and Defenses of the Poisonous Snake
intro_lines: Ibara is consulted by the producer about a design for a personalized outfit for him, but the wary Ibara suggests a difficult theme, attempting to test the producer's abilities...

name: Honey Bee
intro_lines: Kohaku decides to compete against Rinne to see who can land a better job for them, even though he's never gotten one on his own before. He throws himself into the search, but he has a hard time finding the kind of work he wants...

name: Koga Feature Scout
intro_lines: Koga, who hears about the personalized outfits, tells the producer himself that he wants his own outfit, but he is troubled because he can’t get a "rock" design to come together.

name: Vagabond
intro_lines: Kuro has been feeling a strange presence recently, and rumors within ES are ever-growing. Kuro tries to solve the problem on his own, but Souma and Keito won't let him, so the three of them work to uncover the truth together.

name: Izumi Feature Scout
intro_lines: The producer comes to discuss Izumi’s personalized outfit. However, he tests the producer, saying he wants to see what kind of image the producer has for him. The producer puts forth a design immediately, but...

name: Gingerbread House
intro_lines: In order to deal with the sweets sent by fans, Ritsu proposes that they host a witch's gathering. The members gather for a fun tea party when Hajime discovers that something peculiar has been mixed in with the other gifts.

name: Tori Feature Scout
intro_lines: Tori is fired up, as it has come to be his turn to get his own personalized outfit. Although he had an ideal image in mind, the response from Hokuto and the others who saw the finished design was not good, and...

name: King of Thieves
intro_lines: Switch was spending a friendly afternoon together. However, they can’t find some lab equipment while working on moving things, and Tsumugi makes Natsume angry. Sora takes action to try to resolve things, but...

name: Mao Feature Scout
story_name: After School, Youth, and the Student Council
intro_lines: While performing his work as usual, Mao thinks about his own personalized outfit. Mao, facing the producer in the midst of his busy everyday life, was...

name: Beast Survival
intro_lines: Jun is requested by name to act in a play. He's chosen to play a hyena prince, but he has some trouble understanding the inner workings of animals. After asking an acquaintance for advice, a game of make-believe in the savannah begins...

name: Hokuto Feature Scout
story_name: My Dream is to One Day Surpass You
intro_lines: Hokuto was consulted about a personalized outfit for him before the recording of a TV program with his father. It seems that Hokuto, having seen a video of his father from the past, has discovered a direction for his own outfit, and...

name: Dollhouse
intro_lines: Midori hears someone's cry for help, and when he goes to check it out, he finds Mika chasing after Daikichi. They go into a warehouse after him, but the door gets stuck...

name: Mitsuru Feature Scout
intro_lines: Wanting an outfit that reflects who he is, Mitsuru conveys his wish regarding a personalized outfit, but his image of a "superstar" is vague. When he consults the members of his circle...

name: Dead End Land
intro_lines: The ninja association is asked to assist at a theme restaurant. However, Mayoi can't handle the crowd and runs away.

name: HiMERU Feature Scout
intro_lines: HiMERU finds something he is interested in using for his personalized outfit among the materials he had once used. It was an outfit that had been considered among others, but had not been made, and...

name: Summer Snow
intro_lines: Rei hears a rumor that there's a youkai within ES that pulls people into the water, so he and Hinata seek out Kanata to find out the truth—and get caught up in a seemingly unavoidable situation.

name: Souma Feature Scout
intro_lines: Souma enthusiastically consults with the producer about a personalized outfit. Souma says he has a design he wants to use for the outfit, but there is a reason he cannot just use it, and he hesitates.

name: Flowers of the Wasteland
intro_lines: Nagisa pays a visit to Yumenosaki Academy, where he finds the basketball club in the middle of practice. They talk a little bit, but Nagisa's eye is on something else...

name: Shinobu Feature Scout
story_name: Dear Me, Before I Became a Ninja
intro_lines: The personalized outfits steadily progress. Shinobu is asked about his requests by the producer, and decides to answer later. During a conversation with Tetora, he thinks back on his time as a child who admired ninjas.

name: Tsukimigatari
intro_lines: Feeling lonely, Adonis tells some stories about his family. Nazuna tries to cheer him up by telling him the story of the rabbit on the moon, but Adonis takes him seriously, and Nazuna gets backed into a corner.

name: Arashi Feature Scout
intro_lines: Arashi is happily making progress on a personalized outfit with the producer. When she asks Tsukasa, who was interested in it and had come along, for his opinion, Arashi receives an unexpected impression.

name: Werewolf
intro_lines: Natsume and friends are playing Werewolf in the dorms. Hiyori and some others join in the fun, but soon Sora begins acting strangely...

name: Tomoya Feature Scout
intro_lines: Tomoya is worrying over what direction to take with his personalized outfit. He can’t get an idea of what he would like to look like, and so he tries on various outfits, but Hokuto, who was accompanying him, only repeatedly gives him the same opinion.

name: Spy THE Mission
intro_lines: Eichi steals some of Keito's doujinshi to act as a diversion. However, it disappears from the bookshelf where he'd temporarily hidden it. In its place rests a letter...

name: Tsukasa Feature Scout
story_name: As a Knight, As a King
intro_lines: Tsukasa comes to have doubts about a design plan which was worked out with him as a king. With the image of a knight also being a part of Knights, he feels his ideal waver.

name: Halloween BOX
intro_lines: Hinata is feeling down after quarrelling with Yuuta and goes to talk to Hiiro. Upon hearing what Niki has to say, Hinata thinks of a plan for them to make up.

name: Wataru Feature Scout
story_name: That Which is Reflected in Your Eyes
intro_lines: In preparing to make his personalized outfit, the producer comes to observe Wataru closely. While she is concentrating on gathering information, she gets caught up in an unanticipated situation.

name: Turn of the Century Wars
intro_lines: Tetora is preparing for his promotion exam for the Karate Club. Though he's giving his all during lessons and training sessions, he finds himself getting nowhere. Koga, who sees this, proposes a Dragon King Competition!

name: Shu Feature Scout
intro_lines: Shu, who is in Paris, was consulting with the producer remotely about his personalized outfit. Because it overlapped with the making of his contribution to a group exhibition, he leaves the outfit up to the producer, but...

name: XXVeil
intro_lines: As part of the cross agency plan, Makoto and the others arrive at the chalk white mansion to film a movie. The filming seems to be going well, but Izumi's fastidiousness results in retakes. They lodge together while trying to get into character.

name: Rinne Feature Scout
intro_lines: The producer went to see Rinne about making his personalized outfit. However, he says that in order to get to know someone, you should first go on a date, and they end up going out into the city.

name: Branco
intro_lines: Tori and others are gathered for the Shuffle Unit project. However, the project manager goes missing. They end up having to plan the project themselves, but some minor things cause Tori to feel concerned about how Aira is doing...

name: Tsumugi Feature Scout
story_name: The Song Spun at Blue Hour
intro_lines: Tsumugi decides to leave the design of his personalized outfit up to the producer, as he is already swamped with work. It is in that time that he remembers a place that Sora had asked him about, and...

name: Ushimairi (Part One)
intro_lines: Tomoya's proposal is accepted and he is entrusted with a segment on a horror program, but the rumour they had been hoping to make use of is a bust. Then, Rei declares he has a good idea, and begins to speak...

name: Leo Feature Scout
intro_lines: Leo, seeing the producer looking very busy, decides to ask Shu to handle his personalized outfit. He promptly heads for Paris, where Shu is, and gets going on the design, but...

name: Ushimairi (Part Two)
intro_lines: Alkaloid, who are packing up their things to move out of the old Seisoukan building. They safely move into the new dormitory, but Yuzuru finds a wooden carving that it seems was left behind. He looks for it's owner, but no one seems to know.

name: Nazuna Feature Scout
intro_lines: Nazuna visits Yumenosaki Academy for a lecture. He receives advice about personalized outfits, and, while on stage, solidifies his feelings toward outfits and the students.

name: White Lily
intro_lines: Hiiro and company, who are summoned by Eichi. They are selected for a gravure photo shoot for a magazine, but they cannot get the idea of the “princely” boy that is the theme for it, and they come to struggle with it.

name: Hiyori Feature Scout
intro_lines: Hiyori had been looking forward to his outfit, but it seems that he is displeased that the producer is indifferent about it, and he says that he will go out into town and choose it himself.

name: Sweet Hunt
intro_lines: Mao and Ritsu found Niki, who had collapsed from hunger, and the sugar of the cola they gave him allowed him to recover. He is moved by the inexpressible flavor of the homemade cola, and asks for the recipe, but...

name: Yuta Feature Scout
intro_lines: Yuta and Hinata were consulted about their personalized outfits. They decide to each think of their own ideas for outfits, but on the day they announce them, they are almost the same, and...

name: Fake Phantom Thieves
intro_lines: An expensive painting that had been used in a TV show was brought into the Starmony Dorm. Hinata and company mess around with making copies of the painting, but the picture that Mika draws looks exactly like the real one, and...

name: Madara Feature Scout
intro_lines: Amid discussions about his personalized outfit, when Madara asks the producer what outfit she would like him to wear, she suggests a fundoshi outfit. They consult with Kuro, who will be in charge of the sewing, but...

name: Spring Bed
intro_lines: Subaru went to the hospital to visit the producer. He finds a Nemophila flower there. He is told the deep meaning it has in flower language, but the reason he was told it is a secret, and...

name: Rei Feature Scout
intro_lines: It having become his turn for a personalized outfit, Rei calls upon Ritsu to think of a design for it together. He gets a cold reception, but it seems he has his own idea, and...

name: RELOADED
intro_lines: Tomoya and Izumi were, due to certain circumstances, trying to stay out of sight. However, they were spotted by Nazuna and Kanata and hid themselves in a panic. With hands connected by handcuffs...

name: Jun Feature Scout
story_name: Traversing the Wilds, Towards the Horizon
intro_lines: Jun thinks about his personalized outfit in advance. As he puzzles over what direction he should go with it, he receives a summons from Hiyori...

name: ASOBI Club
intro_lines: An email was delivered to the student council’s comment box. It was a request to teach kindergarten children about games from the old days, so Shinobu consults the ASOBI Club members.

name: Adonis Feature Scout
story_name: The Song of Wind, the Sound of Sand
intro_lines: Adonis saw a design for his personalized outfit which incorporated a motif from his birthplace. He feels the differences between himself and others, and his feelings waver.

name: Pretty 5
intro_lines: Tori seems out of sorts during the regular Pretty 5 meeting. When Arashi half-forces him outside and confronts him about it, he says that the topic of formal marriage matchmaking has come up for him.

name: Natsume Feature Scout
intro_lines: The producer has been unsuccessful in her endeavors lately. Natsume sees how she's doing while waiting for a briefing session and offers to tell her fortune...

name: Budding Spring→Ride ON!
intro_lines: Tsukasa and the others are asked to appear in a promotional video for a bicycle manufacturer. High in spirits, they decide to take a break and hang out at a restaurant during their filming...

name: Mayoi Feature Scout
intro_lines: The producer is searching for Mayoi to discuss his personalized outfit, but he's nowhere to be found. Shinobu and co. notice this and then devise a plan.

name: Burning Azaleas
intro_lines: Rei reveals that he's dissatisfied at one of the regularly-held Summit meetings. But when he sees the azaleas that Tsumugi brought, he comes up with a little plan.

name: Aira Feature Scout
intro_lines: Aira is excited that his turn is coming up. He shows Hiiro his plans, but he gets worried when he's suddenly told that his costume doesn't match his image.

name: Ring.A.Bell
intro_lines: Midori and Mao happen upon the producer after school one day at a bookstore, happily picking out a wedding magazine... From this they conclude that she is about to get married.

name: Makoto Feature Scout
intro_lines: Makoto has been contacted about his own personalized outfit. To make it feel more like him, he thinks about his hobbies and personal experiences—but he can't narrow things down, so he finds himself at a loss...

name: GemSphere
intro_lines: A "certain box" brought out during a segment of a variety show ends up never being opened. Nazuna's interest is piqued, and he asks if he and the others can open it themselves.

name: Sora Feature Scout
intro_lines: To get ideas for his personalized outfit, Sora goes around asking others what they think his color is. But he gets a lot of different responses, and it turns out to be difficult to make all the colors to complement each other...

name: Prison Breakers
intro_lines: Makoto and co. happen to see Koga and Tori penny-pinching for lunch. When pressed about the situation, the two admit to being in need of some money they earned by themselves. That's when they're introduced to a show that gives a cash prize...

name: Chiaki Feature Scout
intro_lines: Chiaki has been putting a lot of thought into making the best outfit. But all of his ideas are too difficult to implement into an idol's costume, so he decides to head to the amusement park to reconsider what heroes are.

name: Frontline Watchdogs
intro_lines: Hiyori kicks up a fuss about bringing his pet dog with him to the countryside for a shoot. Ibara tries to persuade him to give it up, but that only ends up with him taking care of her in Hiyori's absence.

name: Hiiro Feature Scout
intro_lines: Hiiro is the only one in ALKALOID who hasn't gotten a personalized outfit, so by the time his turn comes around, he's already thought up a design for it. He asks the people around him what they think, but their responses are lukewarm…

name: Roaring Sea Marina
intro_lines: Izumi and the others are set to go to a tropical island to do a PR shoot for travel goods. They're given an assignment to take some candids of their own, but they all end up looking really awkward...

name: Kohaku Feature Scout
intro_lines: It’s finally Kohaku’s turn for his personalized outfit. However, since he's unfamiliar with non-traditional clothing, he can't seem to visualize what he wants to wear, and struggles to come up with something by himself.

name: Getto Spectacle
intro_lines: The Shuffle Project this time is themed after Kaguya-hime as a tie-in with a popular educational TV program. The five members plan to lodge together, but they can't seem to get in sync. It's then when Hiyori reveals a secret to the other members...

name: Subaru Feature Scout
intro_lines: Subaru is ecstatic that it's finally his turn to get his outfit. He leaves the design up to the producer, but since it's such a precious opportunity, he decides to go find a "special sparkle" with others.

name: One-Man Army
intro_lines: Mao confronts Souma about his sword due to complaints he received from some first-year students. However, they fail to come to an agreement, and upon Subaru's suggestion, Souma decides to go with a fully defensive strategy.

name: Tetora Feature Scout
story_name: The Path That Will One Day Stretch Out To My Ideal
intro_lines: Hinata and the others head over to Tetora when they catch news that he's next. They ask him what he's hoping to see for his outfit, but the only words he can think of is "something cool"...

name: Fruitful OCTOBER
intro_lines: Yuta finds interest in the "grape juice that grants romantic success" that was featured in a magazine, and he goes to talk with the producer about it. That's when Kaoru notices them...

name: Midori Feature Scout
intro_lines: Midori feels depressed as soon as he hears it's his turn to receive a personal outfit. Despite the pressure, he tries his best to visualize an outfit idea, but all he can think of are things he'd rather not wear...

name: Dramatica
intro_lines: The theater group Dramatica is organizing their very first show, and Wataru leaves the casting to Hokuto. Hokuto goes to Tomoya for advice, and decides to ask Shu to play Sanzang, but...

name: Soleil
intro_lines: Mitsuru and Shu find Tsumugi lying face down on a table in the outfit room. They learn that he's extremely busy preparing a local children's workshop, and, feeling bad for him, they decide to help him out.

name: Kanata Feature Scout
story_name: everyone and the sea and me
intro_lines: Kaoru finds seashells and sequins scattered on the floor of the ES building. Curious, he starts picking them up, and there's someone waiting for him at the end of the trail...

name: Detective DANCE (Decadance)
intro_lines: Mika and Makoto are nominated for the lead roles of a movie. Mika doesn't have much confidence in his acting. He's encouraged to "take a break" by tailing behind Ibara, but...

name: Yuzuru Feature Scout
intro_lines: Yuzuru struggles to properly draw a design for his personal outfit. He tries to consult Keito about it, only to be told there’s nothing unique within the design. As he finds himself at a loss, Midori comes to speak to him…

name: Hot Winter
intro_lines: While Izumi was eating lunch in the common room, the most bizarre conversation between Madara and Tatsumi happened before his eyes. According to them, there's some sort of mysterious code plastered on the wall...

name: La Mort
intro_lines: The five of them were able to secure cast roles in the movie's audition. However, Ritsu is conflicted about working together with Rei. Rei seems distant all throughout the shooting, but confused as they may be, the other members continue with their roles...

name: Niki Feature Scout
intro_lines: Niki, who was busy coming up with a new recipe, completely forgot about his personal outfit. He can't think of any ideas on his own, so he decides to go to town with the producer.

name: Tiger of the Fifth Earth Star
story_name: Tiger of the Fifth Earth Star
intro_lines: Leo hears that Natsume is about to show off his hypnosis skills in the dorms. He's interested and joins the show, but Tetora, who's watching nearby, starts behaving strangely...

name: Hinata Feature Scout
intro_lines: Hinata tries to come up with a new design after his personal outfit idea ended up looking similar to Yuta's. As he struggles to figure out what represents him, Wataru and Leo show up...

name: Dance of the White Tiger
intro_lines: Subaru and the others are having a snowball fight at Starmony Dorm. They see Rinne nearby loading something onto a truck. Curious, they try to sneak a peek inside...

name: Hajime Feature Scout
intro_lines: Hajime is both worried and excited for his very own personalized outfit. He isn't sure what to decide on, and goes to Tomoya for advice.

name: Astraea's Atelier
intro_lines: Chiaki and Kuro arrive at Paris, where Shu is. The two of them end up staying at Shu's apartment for a few days, until their filming starts.

name: Kuro Feature Scout
story_name: Donning the Path That Led Me Here
intro_lines: Kuro comes up with a concept for his personalized outfit, but is told that it's not "Kuro" enough. He decides to try asking his old classmates for advice.

name: Romantic? Date
intro_lines: The idols have been asked to star as characters in the dating sim video game Love★Star. The filming is to be done in pairs, but HiMERU and Tatsumi seem to be having trouble...

name: Kaoru Feature Scout
intro_lines: Seeing Kanata plead to Anzu for his personalized outfit makes Kaoru realize he can't wait for his turn. As he's making his way to the agency, thinking about how he should bring it up to Anzu...

name: Myriad of Colors and Flowers
intro_lines: During winter last year... With Repayment Festival on the horizon, Mitsuru searches for Madara. He can't find him anywhere, and instead gets lost in a flower garden he's never seen before.

name: Keito Feature Scout
intro_lines: The producer, along with Kuro and some others, visits Keito's family home to discuss his personalized outfit. Keito checks the outfit designs they've brought and they have a peaceful discussion, but...

name: White Brim
intro_lines: A certain game is to be hosted at a villa owned by the Tenshouin family. Several people, including Tori, Tsukasa, and Hiyori, are invited to join in the noble game of clam digging...

name: Ritsu Feature Scout
intro_lines: Ritsu is concerned about how personalized outfits are adding to the producer's workload, so he decides to come up with his outfit himself. In order to get ideas, he talks to several people...

name: Whimsical City Rider
intro_lines: Hiyori and the others are talking about a time they filmed in a rural location. A farmer they met there told them that their vegetable harvest was so bountiful that they might have to throw some of it out, and Hiyori volunteered to sell it for them...

name: Eichi Feature Scout
intro_lines: Because he kept postponing it, Eichi's turn for his personalized outfit ends up becoming one of the last. He decides to go outside to think about the design and have a change of pace...

name: Puffy☆Bunny
intro_lines: The springtime event Easter Night has been renewed as Easter Festival. Shinobu and the others learn that there will be a shuffle unit performing. Hinata requests that they form a unit among themselves, but he also wants to include a certain person...

name: Nagisa Feature Scout
intro_lines: Nagisa is asked to comment on the design of his personalized outfit that Ibara prepared, but he gives a very abstract reply. They fail to agree on an idea during that meeting, and decide to search for the answer.

name: Band BB
intro_lines: Yuta receives a live offer from a live house he used to perform at, but his agency doesn't let him accept it. In order to do something about it, he goes to Koga for advice...

name: Izumi Feature Scout 2
intro_lines: Izumi is being interviewed by the producer for a solo project called Feature Live. However, they overhear that a certain photoshoot isn't going well...

name: Orient
intro_lines: Midori and co. find a mysterious pair of goggles in the courtyard at Starmony Hall. They think they're part of the VR equipment Natsume had gotten rid of, but when they find out that they still work, they decide to give them a whirl.

name: Nazuna Feature Scout 2
intro_lines: Nazuna is thinking about the photoshoot for a brochure that will come out at a concert. He doesn’t want to disappoint anyone, and is worried about which aspect of himself he wants to show.

name: Sweet Sweet Hunger
intro_lines: Nagisa shows up to a taste-testing event for sweets that Niki is attending. There, he first hears of a popular dessert called "Tian Tian," which is said to have an indescribable but nonetheless very delicious taste...

name: Tsukasa Feature Scout 2
story_name: A Friend, A Detour, A Way Home
intro_lines: Tsukasa receives a request to film his everyday life for a shoot, but he only ever goes straight home. Sora sees him worrying about this and invites Tsukasa to play with him after school...

name: Bankara Graffiti
intro_lines: Jun, Kohaku, and the others are appearing on a webcast called "Bankara School." They thought it would be a fun simulation of school life, but it turns out they need to collect "manliness points," and...

name: Kanata Feature Scout 2
intro_lines: Kanata ponders over places to go for a pamphlet photoshoot. However, he realizes he keeps choosing locations that are all about what he likes, so he decides to try a little reverse brainstorming.

name: Keito Lecture
intro_lines: After a study session, Keito deems it necessary to gauge Hiiro's level in general knowledge. With a suggestion from Kuro, they decide to go camping together.

name: Hajime Feature Scout 2
intro_lines: Hajime and his friends practice at a café to take candid photos for a concert pamphlet. However, they are worried about not being able to act natural.

name: Polka Dots
intro_lines: Tetora had been helping Hinata take care of the garden at school. As thanks, Hinata heads out to invite him to go to the summer festival together, but he encounters many people along the way...

name: Mayoi Feature Scout 2
intro_lines: Upon hearing that he is to perform a solo live, Mayoi panics and runs away. While making his escape, he bumps into Leo and spills his fears about the performance…

name: ANIMALS
intro_lines: Tomoya says he's still on the fence about getting a pet. But one night, the words "Hokuto-senpai" and "don't get pet food all over the place" are heard from his room…

name: Ibara Feature Scout 2
intro_lines: The Feature Live meeting proceeds according to Ibara’s proposal, but it seems like the producer has some suggestions regarding the presentation of the pamphlet...

name: Red Hot Island
intro_lines: Chiaki and the others are invited by Eichi to join a test run of the "treasure hunt" at Aquaria Park. Chiaki remembers a promise he made one summer.

name: Mao Feature Scout 2
intro_lines: Mao is checking over the sample for the live brochures, but he seems dissatisfied with the photos that are being used. He decides to try and rethink which special moments he wants to show.

name: Butou-kai
intro_lines: In order to promote the mixed martial arts program CROSS FIRE, Madara and them form a shuffle unit full of muscle men who take pride in their physical strength. As the members gather, Tetora proposes a certain competition to prove that Kuro is the strongest man in Yumenosaki.

name: Tori Feature Scout 2
intro_lines: Everyone around Tori is looking forward to his Feature Live, and he begins to worry about how he should show himself off when he's the only one in the spotlight.

name: MIRAGE
intro_lines: 2wink receives an offer to appear on Volcano Island once more. But when the brothers are requested to appear together, Yuta comes up with a certain little "prank".

name: Rei Feature Scout 2
intro_lines: The producer is dissatisfied with the photos taken for Rei's Feature Live, which all ended up being laid-back candids. Rei decides to reconsider...

name: Chill Yellow
intro_lines: Hokuto and friends are aiming to audition for a film directed by someone they admire. The only characters in this film are "bad guys”, so they decide to train in order to act like villains.

name: Rinne Feature Scout 2
intro_lines: When Rinne doesn't show up for a scheduled meeting with the Producer, the members of Crazy:B help look for him. But it seems like he has dozed off…

name: PORTRAIT - Look back -
intro_lines: Time has passed, and the truth of a "certain incident" is revealed in an interview. This is the story of three child models and a gravure model.

name: Sora Feature Scout 2
intro_lines: Sora is asked what he'd like to do for his pamphlet photoshoot. He requests that he go someplace with Natsume and Tsumugi where they can interact with animals…

name: Dolly Knight
intro_lines: Hajime decides to sell his old toys at the flea market to find them new owners. Adonis, who wants to experience the flea market himself, joins him.

name: Nagisa Feature Scout 2
story_name: Sometimes, Days Like This Are Also
intro_lines: Nagisa comes with Jun to a game center to play. There, he bumps into the Producer, and receives her request to capture this experience in photographs.
